name: GunWorld VR Demo (Quest)
description:
(DEMO VERSION, visit steam or oculus for full version)

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585530/GunWorld_VR 

Sidequest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/5220

Discord: https://discord.gg/zdX9PCt

Fully physics based gun simulator. Build any gun possible - limitless attachments and options. 100% physical hands with realistic handling - just like real life. Play multiple mini-games and modes, and battle over 100 enemies on a single map in War Mode!
